articles.author: MOGOMOTSI MAGOME Associated Press
articles.title: American hiker found dead on South Africa's Table Mountain - ABC News
articles.description: An American woman who went missing while on a hike on Table Mountain in Cape Town, South Africa has died and her body has been recovered, authorities said on Monday
articles.content:
JOHANNESBURG -- An American woman who went missing while on a hike on Table Mountain in Cape Town, South Africa has died and her body has been recovered, authorities said on Monday.
